<<<<<<< HEAD
Paidobaptismos orthobaptismos: or, The baptism of infants vindicated by scriptures and reasons Humbly offered in order to a composure of differences at this juncture of time. By Nath. Taylor, M.A. Taylor, Nathanael, d. 1702.
[8], 96 p.
printed for Richard Butler next door to the Lamb and Three Bowls in Barbican, London : 1683.
The first two words of title are in Greek characters. Pages stained with print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the John Rylands University Library of Manchester.
=======

[8], 96 p.
printed for Richard Butler next door to the Lamb and Three Bowls in Barbican, London : 1683.
The first two words of title are in Greek characters. Pages stained with print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the John Rylands University Library of Manchester.
